name: Brave Snake
description:
Go through a small but challenging path together with the plucky snake. The game is inspired by the good old snake from old phones, but with the addition of new mechanics and, most importantly, individual levels. You will also be able to play in infinite mode. 

This is my first project. It is still in development. I'd love it if you give it a try and leave your feedback. Thank you!

I recommend using a gamepad
